description: Send your child on a fun adventure with the Caped Crusader and our 60-piece “Batman” giant floor puzzle! Fill your child’s playtime with a skill-building activity that’s quiet, calming and fun! Our “Batman” giant floor puzzle has large pieces that are easy for young children to hold. Watch their delight as they reveal two views of Gotham City’s superhero. The background of schematic drawings shows the Bat Cape, Bat Cowl, Batmobile and more. Puzzles help develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering hours of relaxing fun!
